user.title: User's
user.message: Track's a users details and the their associated vacations.

store.title: Stores
store.message: Regional's stores they oversee, containing the store manager and manager count.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.message: Shows a visual display of a calendar with all of the users vacations.

blockDates.title: Block Dates
blockDates.message: List of dates that a user is not able to take a vacation on.

map.title: Map
map.message: List of all the stores, their locations, and directions to get there.

report.title: Reports
report.message: Report information of stores, users, and the users vacations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: Contact admin with any issues or questions about the app.
